item.title: [Pi] Interface
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I was wondering how to raise the bottom interface, so it’s in the same spot as the top interface.

Also, how can I change the font of the bottom interface to “2”?

Here is the updatePlayers method.

[code] public static void updatePlayers() {
Iterator iterator = waitingRoom.keySet().iterator();
while (iterator.hasNext()) {
Client player = (Client) iterator.next();
int team = waitingRoom.get(player);
if (player != null) {
player.getPA().sendFrame126("", 6570);
player.getPA().sendFrame126("", 6572);
player.getPA().sendFrame126("" + ((gameStartTimer * 3) + (timeRemaining * 3)) + “”, 6664);
player.getPA().walkableInterface(6673);

			}
        }[/code]

Read full topic
